snippet: As President Obama negotiates a spending and revenue deal, the defense secretary and Pentagon officials warned that there could be larger budget reductions than expected.
abstract: Defense Sec Chuck Hagel and Pentagon officials warn there could be larger defense budget reductions than expected, as Pres Obama negotiates spending and revenue deal with Congress; challenge is to trim Pentagon while also assuring military continues to attract high-quality personnel and can maintain American and allied security around world.
lead_paragraph: As President Obama negotiates a spending and revenue deal, the defense secretary and Pentagon officials warned that there could be larger budget reductions than expected.

headline.seo: Hagel Facing Some Tough Decisions at Pentagon
headline.main: Hagel Warns of Big Squeeze at the Pentagon
headline.print_headline: Hagel Warns Of Big Squeeze At the Pentagon

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
